titleStmt.title: The yeomans prerogative, or, The honour of husbandry. A sermon preached to some, and dedicated to all the yeomen and farmers of Kent. May 27. 1652. By Nathanael Newbury, master in arts, and minister of God's word at Ludenham, in the said county.
titleStmt.author: Newbury, Nathanael.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Moxon, for J.N.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
